metadata.title: CVE-2015-3862 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: mediaserver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows attackers to cause adenial of service (process crash) via unspecified vectors, aka internal bug22954006.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
